<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Upsert an Instance"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/policy-svc/instance/{instanceId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Allows user to upsert a new policy instance based on a template.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Instance ID","in":"path","name":"instanceId","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"instance":{"properties":{"endpoint":{"example":"/user-svc/register","type":"string"},"id":{"type":"string"},"parameters":{"properties":{"blocklist":{"properties":{"blockedIPs":{"items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array","uniqueItems":false}},"type":"object","title":"policy_svc.BlocklistParameters"},"rateLimit":{"properties":{"entity":{"example":"userId","type":"string","x-enum-varnames":["EntityUserID","EntityIP"],"title":"policy_svc.Entity"},"maxRequests":{"example":10,"type":"integer"},"scope":{"example":"endpoint","type":"string","x-enum-varnames":["ScopeEndpoint","ScopeGlobal"],"title":"policy_svc.Scope"},"timeWindow":{"example":"1m","type":"string"}},"type":"object","title":"policy_svc.RateLimitParameters"}},"type":"object","title":"policy_svc.Parameters"},"templateId":{"example":"rate-limit","type":"string","x-enum-varnames":["TemplateIdRateLimit","TemplateIdBlocklist"],"title":"policy_svc.TemplateId"}},"required":["parameters","templateId"],"type":"object","title":"policy_svc.Instance"}},"type":"object","title":"policy_svc.UpsertInstanceRequest"}}},"description":"Upsert Instance Request","required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","title":"policy_svc.UpsertInstanceResponse"}}},"description":"Instance upserted successfully"},"400":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object","title":"policy_svc.ErrorResponse"}}},"description":"Invalid JSON"},"401":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object","title":"policy_svc.ErrorResponse"}}},"description":"Unauthorized"},"500":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object","title":"policy_svc.ErrorResponse"}}},"description":"Internal Server Error"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
